name: flower power square
notes:
crochet flower power square – a versatile square that can be used for many projects like blankets, table mats or bags why not add some to an old garment to spruce it up.

the pattern instructions are in both usa and uk formats, written in english.

**please note that the pattern is available for free on my blog [www.crochetncreate.com][1]**

finished size approx:- 5 x 5 inches

level: intermediate
